name: HexaGlitcher
description:
HexaGlitcher is a top down shooter. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible, therefore killing enemies. What’s the highest score you can reach?

Controls

Use the space key to navigate through the menus.

Use WASD to navigate the player.

You can shoot if you hold down the left mouse button.

Mechanics

Enemies and the player can break the floor. It is possible to break the floor by moving around.

Once the floor has turned completely red it gets dangerous for the player. The player instantly dies when he moves onto red tiles. Luckily the floor slowly regenerates.

Enemies

There are three different enemies in the game.

First, there are small red enemies. They are fast but easy to kill.

The orange enemies are pretty slow, but they can also destroy the floor by moving around. They have a total of 25 lives.

Then there are also infected floor tiles. They will spread across the whole map and prevent the floor from regenerating itself.
